description: This plugin for [KeePass 2](https://keepass.info/) password manager is intended for fast authorization to a database after its first unlock with biometrics using [Windows Hello technology](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/17215/windows-10-what-is-hello).
summary: KeePass plugin to unlock database via Windows Hello
author: Sasha Sitnikov,  Andrei Osipkov
